id: Increased ridge height of previously approved two storey side extension by 350mm and erection of rear dormer loft conversion.

id: Erection of an electric barrier serving communal carpark of Flats 1-21 Songhurst Close.

Demolition of the existing commercial building and erection of a furniture distribution warehouse (Use Class B8), including associated servicing area, cycle and refuse storage, boundary treatments, and access works.

Erection of single-storey front extension, single/two-storey side and rear wraparound extension (in place of the existing side extension, detached garage and rear conservatory), rear dormers, extension/alteration to the existing patio, and all associated works.
